features: Secure Cloud Storage Options: Enjoy AES-128 encrypted cloud storage with an optional subscription plan (sold separately). Take advantage of a 30-day free trial for uninterrupted recording, reviewing, and sharing.
AI-Enhanced Human Detection: Utilize advanced AI technology to accurately identify people while filtering out irrelevant motion, such as cars and trees.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: All-Inclusive Security Package: Equipped with a 5200mAh rechargeable battery and a complimentary indoor chime, this doorbell camera offers a comprehensive home security solution.

AI-Enhanced Human Detection: Utilize advanced AI technology to accurately identify people while filtering out irrelevant motion, such as cars and trees. Real-Time Two-Way Communication: Easily interact with visitors from any location in real-time. Cutting-Edge Night Vision Capabilities: Six infrared lights and a smart IR sensor provide crisp, high-resolution videos in low-light conditions, both day and night.

Secure Cloud Storage Options: Enjoy AES-128 encrypted cloud storage with an optional subscription plan (sold separately). Take advantage of a 30-day free trial for uninterrupted recording, reviewing, and sharing. Complimentary Chime for Added Convenience: Place the included doorbell chime in your dining room, kitchen, or terrace to receive instant alerts. Connect multiple chimes to a single doorbell for increased versatility. Always know who's ringing. Resilient Weather Resistance: Featuring IP65 dustproof and waterproof certification, this video doorbell provides consistent security in various weather conditions throughout the year.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great camera and quality
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install and set up works great to see the playback you will have to purchase a subscription but it is very affordable and worth it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You can hook up to 5g only equipment and 2.4
reviews.reviewText: I love aiwit cameras they are great picture quality, motion detection, sound and night vision. They are also affordable and great customer service. Absolutely sucks you have to pay for 6 months to year at a time for cloud because a lot of people can't afford that !! There should still be a monthly option. I on the other hand have had aiwit camera, close to 4 years and gave my mother one before I knew the 5g trick below . Batteries last for awhile I keep my censor up so mine last laess but you can also order the batteries and a charger separately so you don't have to leave your cameras down to charge .You can hook 2.4 g devices to 5g only equipment .Call your provider ( mine was spectrum ) and ask for technical support. Tell them you need the hour assistant to hook up 2.4 g devices. Make sure beforehand you download your apps and have them ready. I went through 3 years of different equipment till I got someone who actually knew what they were doing and now after having to buy all new cameras again they are finally working!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: I love that the camera is super easy to install!The battery last much longer than other doorbell cameras I have used in the past. The app allows me to have multiple cameras around my home and receive notifications all in the same place!!I have recommended these cameras to several family and friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very good camera for the price
reviews.reviewText: I don’t like that we are forced to purchase Icloud service to see any alerts- only real time is available. I also don’t like that the camera can be pulled out of its bracket so easily. OtherwiseIt has very good range and the picture clarity and distance are quite good.; also, the door bell and camera were easy to set up on my phone.Overall , very Good camera for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality camera
reviews.reviewText: This is my second security camera purchase from the Await brand. I like the ease of setup , and convenient USB charging. The camera and sound quality is exceptional.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Save your money and buy something better.
reviews.reviewText: Night vision is a joke. Looks dark and can't see anything. Camera sucks. Video not clear at all when zooming in. Cameras not clear when not zooming in. Hard to make whats in the background cause camera sucks big timer. Oh and did I mention it's slow!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Doorbell was easy to setup. The awit app makes it easy to adjust door bell. The camera is clear. Happy with purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased 2 of these doorbell cameras and they are absolutely perfect! The whole setup, pairing, and mounting was very quick and easy. The picture quality is great. No complaints at the moment. I also ordered spare batteries so I don't have to be with a doorbell camera.
